Restaurants.Restaurant-Mission: To bring joy throughout the world, one bowl at a time
Restaurants.Brand-Phrase: Fresh curry, warm naan, happy families
Restaurants.Group: a part of the DRG Family
Restaurants.Menu-Item-1-description: Toasted and warmed spices in a tangy tomato gravy
Restaurants.Menu-Item-2-description: Creamy and decadent gravy with a velvetty texture
Restaurants.Menu-Item-3-description: A traditional rice dish with succulent lamb interleaved with rice, saffron milk, and spices
Restaurants.Menu-Item-4-description: A beloved meat of India with coconut milk based gravy

Restaurants.Restaurant-Mission: We will make taco tuesday every day of the week
Restaurants.Brand-Phrase: Tacos should not be 4 dollars,but they should taste as such. That is where we come in.
Restaurants.Group: a part of the DRG Family
Restaurants.Menu-Item-1-description: Tacos wrapped in fresh corn tortillas, onion, cilantro, and your choice of meat
Restaurants.Menu-Item-2-description: Burritos served with beans, guacamole, pico. rice or fries if California style
Restaurants.Menu-Item-3-description: Everything that comes in a taco, but with griddled and melted queso oaxaca.
Restaurants.Menu-Item-4-description: Everything that comes in a taco, on a flour tortilla, griddled and melted spicy monterry jack cheese

Restaurants.Restaurant-Mission: To create a fresh wholesome experience unico in Italia
Restaurants.Group: a part of the DRG Family
Restaurants.Menu-Item-1-description: anchovies, olives, tomatoes, ond other savory items combined into a beautiful sauce served atop fresh spaghetti.
Restaurants.Menu-Item-2-description: Braised chicken in a tomato and bellpepper sauce, served atop your choice of fresh noodles or without
Restaurants.Menu-Item-3-description: Layered meat, tomato based sauce, and your choice of bechamel or ricotta layered inbetween.
Restaurants.Menu-Item-4-description: Spicy and hearty tomato based sauce. Served with your choice of fresh noodles and meat.

Restaurants.Restaurant-Mission: To perfect the dark arts of mesquite
Restaurants.Brand-Phrase: Death, Taxes, Steak; and we have the steak.
Restaurants.Group: a part of the DRG Family
Restaurants.Menu-Item-1-description: A beautiful 12oz Ribeye cooked to perfection over mesquite.
Restaurants.Menu-Item-2-description: A return to a simpler, more cavelike time. 20 oz of meat on a bone grilled on mesquite.
Restaurants.Menu-Item-3-description: 12 oz of TX strip, not NY, this one is grilled on mesquite.
Restaurants.Menu-Item-4-description: Warm honey-cinna-buttered rolls made fresh, the real reason you're here. Cooked in a mesquite powered oven.
